Description: Minimal required set of individual-level clinical data across different cohort collections in practice
DependsOn: Lab ID,Sex,Race,Ethnicity,Age,BMI,Age at Menarche,Genetic Alteration,Menopause Status,Gravidity,Parity,Menopause Status

Description: More idealized, RFC-proposed set of individual-level clinical data that extends Cohort Core
DependsOn: Class BRCA1,Class BRCA2,Menopause Cycle Stage,Primary Diagnosis,Previous Diagnosis,Tobacco Use,Pack Years Smoked,Alcohol Use,Drinks Per Week,Antibiotic Use

Description: Portal-specific augmented set of individual-level clinical data that extends Cohort Core
Minimal required set of sample-level clinical data
DependsOn: Sample ID, Sample Collection Center, Sample Site, Tumor Grade, Status ER, Status PR, Status HER2
